attributes.title: Charli D’Amelio
attributes.review: This is the official Charli D’Amelio review. This needs to be taken down of the app store due to problems that are causing my email and credit cards getting banned, most likely being hacked in my account. Please as me Charli D’Amelio 60M+ followers, would like to ban this app off the app store. Please and thank you.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible... it took multiple days to download for some reason and when it first started working it said it would take multiple days to load this app until it’s full good use of the app... so 🤍😬✨

attributes.title: Not usable
attributes.review: This app was so difficult to navigate and I couldn’t even get past the first image bc it was so disgusting to look at they should change it to something more appealing to their audience. Overall 0/5 but I have to give it 1 star :(

attributes.title: Worst app ever 🙄
attributes.review: It gave me corona🤡. I downloaded trumps app to protect me from corona and other things. I also took his advice and drunk bleach🤷🏽‍♀️. After doing all these things to project myself I now have corona and hot Cheeto syndrome😭. If I could rate it 0 starts I would. Zero out of 10 would not recommend 💅🏾

attributes.title: changed my life🥰👁👄👁🤪💫✨😗✌️🥵for the worst
attributes.review: i downloaded it and it gave my phone VIRUSES that came as notifications, almost had to throw away the whole phone smh my head. 10/10 do not recommend to anyone w the slightest amount of brain cells, i swear my IQ was lowered just by downloading.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app took days to upload and when it finally worked it hacked my phone 0/10 would not recommend anyone using this app if you don’t want your phone hacked like mine then don’t get this app thank you for your time

Wow this app is terrible just 🧚awful I downloaded it but as 💘💝soon as I got the app🧚a crusty dusty hot Cheeto piped up and then asked for 💚my number then I 💕💕woke up in the middle of the night and saw him again 😘staring at me 🥰and then he grabbed my phone and deleted the app 10/10 do NOT 🧚recommend🥳

attributes.title: Can’t BELIEVE IT.
attributes.review: I just downloaded this app and it made my whole phone glitch and pop up with little Cheetos. Sorry I mean little trumps all over my screen. It also hacked my Instagram and gave away my info. I 100% recommend not getting this app.😡

attributes.title: Worst review
attributes.review: This is the WORST app that was ever created this app almost wiped my history from my phone and almost hacked my phone to get information about me my family friends ip adress credit card information and s__ually abuse. This should be no stars once so ever.

When I made and account for yours truly Ben Dover, so I could support my non racist, homophobic president, it said that in order to to make that account I had to send my president a collection of child pictures but all the children were ugly. AND I found out he cheated on me so 😓. Now I am ✨traumatized ✨
